keyMappings:
unmap x
unmap X

map y copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map d removeTab
map u restoreTab

map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

map <c-h> scrollLeft
map <c-l> scrollRight

map J scrollPageDown
map K scrollPageUp

map ,b <c-d>

map ,p togglePinTab

map s Vomnibar.activate keyword=g
map t Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map z Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map O Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map S Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=google
map T Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext
searchEngines:
a: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
imdb: http://www.imdb.com/find?q=%s IMDB
l: https://lucidlife.wordpress.com/?s=%s LucidLife
r: https://www.reddit.com/search?q=%s Reddit
sb https://stackblitz.com/fork/%s
tpb: https://thepiratebay.org/search/%s TPB
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
wiki: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
